title: Black Screen after clicking Launch (PBE)
body:
So the problem I'm having is where I click launch and then it opens to this. https://gyazo.com/39ca4d33e2413b061849f95f03ea0716
I've reinstalled twice,repaired files, and deleted certain files and reinstalling them. None of these "solutions" have worked at all. Please help.
My Graphics Card is a, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3gb.
EDIT: This is also a problem for the normal League launcher as well.

replies.body:
Black screens in League often occur as a result of your client not being able to access the specific subset of servers your client is trying to load at the moment. Incompatible network settings are the biggest factor, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I went and did all of them, none helped...{{item:3070}}

In that case, we'll need to dive into your system logs to troubleshoot this further. I recommend running a set of these logs using our [Hextech tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
I have made a Support Ticket, but its been up for a while and I've had no response...
We've been pretty slammed with tickets lately, so a reply may be a bit more delayed than normal. Our tech team is working their butts off, so with your patience, a specialist will be with you soon.
Ok thanks, just really wish I could get to the Teemoing....

I am experiencing the same thing and put in a Discussion on this topic. I am now facing a 15 minute dodge buster because with this exact same issue, my game becomes unresponsive and crashes. Yes, I, too have used the connection guide and it did not solve the problem.
